title: Alternate Measures
author: J. Smith
description:
Go for a walk 
Reconnect with  an old friend 
Paint or draw 
Go to the park 
Play some sports 
Meditate 
Go watch a movie 
Learn to play an instrument
Go to the gym 
Read a book 
Learn a new language
